text: Benedetto "Bettino" Craxi (; 24 February 1934 â€“ 19 January 2000) was an Italian politician. He was Prime Minister of Italy from 1983 to 1987. ==Early life== Craxi was born in Milan on 24 February 1934. His father was a Sicilian lawyer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Craxi Foundation website Category:1934 births Category:2000 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Politicians from Milan Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Italian Socialist Party politicians Category:Italian Roman Catholics Category:Presidents of the European Council
title: Bettino Craxi
